Pass `type(uint).max` to transfer the initiator's balance.","receiver":"The address that will receive the tokens.","token":"The address of the ERC20 token to transfer."}},"erc4626Deposit(address,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Underlying tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.Assumes the given vault implements EIP-4626.","params":{"assets":"The amount of underlying token to deposit. Pass `type(uint).max` to deposit the adapter's balance.","maxSharePriceE27":"The maximum amount of assets to pay to get 1 share, scaled by 1e27.","receiver":"The address to which shares will be minted.","vault":"The address of the vault."}},"erc4626Mint(address,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Underlying tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.Assumes the given vault implements EIP-4626.","params":{"maxSharePriceE27":"The maximum amount of assets to pay to get 1 share, scaled by 1e27.","receiver":"The address to which shares will be minted.","shares":"The amount of vault shares to mint.","vault":"The address of the vault."}},"erc4626Redeem(address,uint256,uint256,address,address)":{"details":"Assumes the given `vault` implements EIP-4626.If `owner` is the initiator, they must have previously approved the adapter to spend their vault shares. Otherwise, vault shares must have been previously sent to the adapter.","params":{"minSharePriceE27":"The minimum number of assets to receive per share, scaled by 1e27.","owner":"The address on behalf of which the shares are redeemed. Can only be the adapter or the initiator.","receiver":"The address that will receive the withdrawn assets.","shares":"The amount of vault shares to redeem. Pass `type(uint).max` to redeem the owner's shares.","vault":"The address of the vault."}},"erc4626Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256,address,address)":{"details":"Assumes the given `vault` implements EIP-4626.If `owner` is the initiator, they must have previously approved the adapter to spend their vault shares. Otherwise, vault shares must have been previously sent to the adapter.","params":{"assets":"The amount of underlying token to withdraw.","minSharePriceE27":"The minimum number of assets to receive per share, scaled by 1e27.","owner":"The address on behalf of which the assets are withdrawn. Can only be the adapter or the initiator.","receiver":"The address that will receive the withdrawn assets.","vault":"The address of the vault."}},"morphoBorrow((address,address,address,address,uint256),uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Either `assets` or `shares` should be zero. Most usecases should rely on `assets` as an input so the initiator is guaranteed to borrow `assets` tokens, but the possibility to mint a specific amount of shares is given for full compatibility and precision.Initiator must have previously authorized the adapter to act on their behalf on Morpho.","params":{"assets":"The amount of assets to borrow.","marketParams":"The Morpho market to borrow assets from.","minSharePriceE27":"The minimum amount of assets borrowed per borrow share minted, scaled by 1e27.","receiver":"The address that will receive the borrowed assets.","shares":"The amount of shares to mint."}},"morphoFlashLoan(address,uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"assets":"The amount of assets to flash loan.","data":"Arbitrary data to pass to the `onMorphoFlashLoan` callback.","token":"The address of the token to flash loan."}},"morphoRepay((address,address,address,address,uint256),uint256,uint256,uint256,address,bytes)":{"details":"Either `assets` or `shares` should be zero. Most usecases should rely on `assets` as an input so the adapter is guaranteed to have `assets` tokens pulled from its balance, but the possibility to burn a specific amount of shares is given for full compatibility and precision.Loan tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.","params":{"assets":"The amount of assets to repay. Pass `type(uint).max` to repay the adapter's loan asset balance.","data":"Arbitrary data to pass to the `onMorphoRepay` callback. Pass empty data if not needed.","marketParams":"The Morpho market to repay assets to.","maxSharePriceE27":"The maximum amount of assets repaid per borrow share burned, scaled by 1e27.","onBehalf":"The address of the owner of the debt position.","shares":"The amount of shares to burn. Pass `type(uint).max` to repay the initiator's entire debt."}},"morphoSupply((address,address,address,address,uint256),uint256,uint256,uint256,address,bytes)":{"details":"Either `assets` or `shares` should be zero. Most usecases should rely on `assets` as an input so the adapter is guaranteed to have `assets` tokens pulled from its balance, but the possibility to mint a specific amount of shares is given for full compatibility and precision.Loan tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.","params":{"assets":"The amount of assets to supply. Pass `type(uint).max` to supply the adapter's loan asset balance.","data":"Arbitrary data to pass to the `onMorphoSupply` callback. Pass empty data if not needed.","marketParams":"The Morpho market to supply assets to.","maxSharePriceE27":"The maximum amount of assets supplied per minted share, scaled by 1e27.","onBehalf":"The address that will own the increased supply position.","shares":"The amount of shares to mint."}},"morphoSupplyCollateral((address,address,address,address,uint256),uint256,address,bytes)":{"details":"Collateral tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.","params":{"assets":"The amount of collateral to supply. Pass `type(uint).max` to supply the adapter's collateral balance.","data":"Arbitrary data to pass to the `onMorphoSupplyCollateral` callback. Pass empty data if not needed.","marketParams":"The Morpho market to supply collateral to.","onBehalf":"The address that will own the increased collateral position."}},"morphoWithdraw((address,address,address,address,uint256),uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Either `assets` or `shares` should be zero. Most usecases should rely on `assets` as an input so the initiator is guaranteed to withdraw `assets` tokens, but the possibility to burn a specific amount of shares is given for full compatibility and precision.Initiator must have previously authorized the maodule to act on their behalf on Morpho.","params":{"assets":"The amount of assets to withdraw.","marketParams":"The Morpho market to withdraw assets from.","minSharePriceE27":"The minimum amount of assets withdraw per burn share, scaled by 1e27.","receiver":"The address that will receive the withdrawn assets.","shares":"The amount of shares to burn. Pass `type(uint).max` to burn all the initiator's supply shares."}},"morphoWithdrawCollateral((address,address,address,address,uint256),uint256,address)":{"details":"Initiator must have previously authorized the adapter to act on their behalf on Morpho.","params":{"assets":"The amount of collateral to withdraw. Pass `type(uint).max` to withdraw the initiator's collateral balance.","marketParams":"The Morpho market to withdraw collateral from.","receiver":"The address that will receive the collateral assets."}},"nativeTransfer(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of native tokens to transfer. Pass `type(uint).max` to transfer the adapter's balance (this allows 0 value transfers).","receiver":"The address that will receive the native tokens."}},"onMorphoFlashLoan(uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"data":"Bytes containing an abi-encoded Call[]."}},"onMorphoRepay(uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"data":"Bytes containing an abi-encoded Call[]."}},"onMorphoSupply(uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"data":"Bytes containing an abi-encoded Call[]."}},"onMorphoSupplyCollateral(uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"data":"Bytes containing an abi-encoded Call[]."}},"permit2TransferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of token to transfer. c/libraries/UtilsLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7400fa7b6cf7cfd5e4662d820e658ad4d194975459f5e863f4fd10a48a7b69ba","license":"GPL-2.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://88a95464430e20b9986dbc2463063aba0e379310bfb56743a4eb5284c31848c5","dweb:/ipfs/QmTf3eq7iNSYou2csn2K1pKDAHN46ARP5Q9qTDw1yVAZVB"]}},"version":1}

params.bundler3: The address of the Bundler3 contract.
params.morpho: The address of the Morpho protocol.
params.wNative: The address of the canonical native token wrapper.

params.amount: The amount of token to transfer. Pass `type(uint).max` to transfer the adapter's balance (this allows 0 value transfers).
params.receiver: The address that will receive the tokens.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to transfer.

params.amount: The amount of token to transfer. Pass `type(uint).max` to transfer the initiator's balance.
params.receiver: The address that will receive the tokens.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to transfer.

erc4626Deposit(address,uint256,uint256,a.details: Underlying tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.Assumes the given vault implements EIP-4626.

params.assets: The amount of underlying token to deposit. Pass `type(uint).max` to deposit the adapter's balance.
params.maxSharePriceE27: The maximum amount of assets to pay to get 1 share, scaled by 1e27.
params.receiver: The address to which shares will be minted.

erc4626Mint(address,uint256,uint256,addr.details: Underlying tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.Assumes the given vault implements EIP-4626.

params.maxSharePriceE27: The maximum amount of assets to pay to get 1 share, scaled by 1e27.
params.receiver: The address to which shares will be minted.
params.shares: The amount of vault shares to mint.

erc4626Redeem(address,uint256,uint256,ad.details: Assumes the given `vault` implements EIP-4626.If `owner` is the initiator, they must have previously approved the adapter to spend their vault shares. Otherwise, vault shares must have been previously sent to the adapter.

params.minSharePriceE27: The minimum number of assets to receive per share, scaled by 1e27.
params.owner: The address on behalf of which the shares are redeemed. Can only be the adapter or the initiator.
params.receiver: The address that will receive the withdrawn assets.
params.shares: The amount of vault shares to redeem. Pass `type(uint).max` to redeem the owner's shares.

erc4626Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256,.details: Assumes the given `vault` implements EIP-4626.If `owner` is the initiator, they must have previously approved the adapter to spend their vault shares. Otherwise, vault shares must have been previously sent to the adapter.

params.assets: The amount of underlying token to withdraw.
params.minSharePriceE27: The minimum number of assets to receive per share, scaled by 1e27.
params.owner: The address on behalf of which the assets are withdrawn. Can only be the adapter or the initiator.
params.receiver: The address that will receive the withdrawn assets.

morphoBorrow((address,address,address,ad.details: Either `assets` or `shares` should be zero. Most usecases should rely on `assets` as an input so the initiator is guaranteed to borrow `assets` tokens, but the possibility to mint a specific amount of shares is given for full compatibility and precision.Initiator must have previously authorized the adapter to act on their behalf on Morpho.

params.assets: The amount of assets to borrow.
params.marketParams: The Morpho market to borrow assets from.
params.minSharePriceE27: The minimum amount of assets borrowed per borrow share minted, scaled by 1e27.
params.receiver: The address that will receive the borrowed assets.
params.shares: The amount of shares to mint.

params.assets: The amount of assets to flash loan.
params.data: Arbitrary data to pass to the `onMorphoFlashLoan` callback.
params.token: The address of the token to flash loan.

morphoRepay((address,address,address,add.details: Either `assets` or `shares` should be zero. Most usecases should rely on `assets` as an input so the adapter is guaranteed to have `assets` tokens pulled from its balance, but the possibility to burn a specific amount of shares is given for full compatibility and precision.Loan tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.

params.assets: The amount of assets to repay. Pass `type(uint).max` to repay the adapter's loan asset balance.
params.data: Arbitrary data to pass to the `onMorphoRepay` callback. Pass empty data if not needed.
params.marketParams: The Morpho market to repay assets to.
params.maxSharePriceE27: The maximum amount of assets repaid per borrow share burned, scaled by 1e27.
params.onBehalf: The address of the owner of the debt position.
params.shares: The amount of shares to burn. Pass `type(uint).max` to repay the initiator's entire debt.

morphoSupply((address,address,address,ad.details: Either `assets` or `shares` should be zero. Most usecases should rely on `assets` as an input so the adapter is guaranteed to have `assets` tokens pulled from its balance, but the possibility to mint a specific amount of shares is given for full compatibility and precision.Loan tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.

params.assets: The amount of assets to supply. Pass `type(uint).max` to supply the adapter's loan asset balance.
params.data: Arbitrary data to pass to the `onMorphoSupply` callback. Pass empty data if not needed.
params.marketParams: The Morpho market to supply assets to.
params.maxSharePriceE27: The maximum amount of assets supplied per minted share, scaled by 1e27.
params.onBehalf: The address that will own the increased supply position.
params.shares: The amount of shares to mint.

morphoSupplyCollateral((address,address,.details: Collateral tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.

params.assets: The amount of collateral to supply. Pass `type(uint).max` to supply the adapter's collateral balance.
params.data: Arbitrary data to pass to the `onMorphoSupplyCollateral` callback. Pass empty data if not needed.
params.marketParams: The Morpho market to supply collateral to.
params.onBehalf: The address that will own the increased collateral position.

morphoWithdraw((address,address,address,.details: Either `assets` or `shares` should be zero. Most usecases should rely on `assets` as an input so the initiator is guaranteed to withdraw `assets` tokens, but the possibility to burn a specific amount of shares is given for full compatibility and precision.Initiator must have previously authorized the maodule to act on their behalf on Morpho.

params.assets: The amount of assets to withdraw.
params.marketParams: The Morpho market to withdraw assets from.
params.minSharePriceE27: The minimum amount of assets withdraw per burn share, scaled by 1e27.
params.receiver: The address that will receive the withdrawn assets.
params.shares: The amount of shares to burn. Pass `type(uint).max` to burn all the initiator's supply shares.

morphoWithdrawCollateral((address,addres.details: Initiator must have previously authorized the adapter to act on their behalf on Morpho.

params.assets: The amount of collateral to withdraw. Pass `type(uint).max` to withdraw the initiator's collateral balance.
params.marketParams: The Morpho market to withdraw collateral from.
params.receiver: The address that will receive the collateral assets.

params.amount: The amount of native tokens to transfer. Pass `type(uint).max` to transfer the adapter's balance (this allows 0 value transfers).
params.receiver: The address that will receive the native tokens.

params.amount: The amount of token to transfer. Pass `type(uint).max` to transfer the initiator's balance.
params.receiver: The address that will receive the tokens.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to transfer.

unwrapNative(uint256,address).details: Wrapped native tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.

params.amount: The amount of wrapped native token to unwrap. Pass `type(uint).max` to unwrap the adapter's balance.
params.receiver: The account receiving the native tokens.

wrapNative(uint256,address).details: Native tokens must have been previously sent to the adapter.

params.amount: The amount of native token to wrap. Pass `type(uint).max` to wrap the adapter's balance.
params.receiver: The account receiving the wrapped native tokens.

erc4626Mint(address,uint256,uint256,addr.notice: Mints shares of an ERC4626 vault.

erc4626Redeem(address,uint256,uint256,ad.notice: Redeems shares of an ERC4626 vault.

erc4626Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Withdraws underlying token from an ERC4626 vault.

morphoFlashLoan(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Triggers a flash loan on Morpho.

onMorphoFlashLoan(uint256,bytes).notice: Receives flashloan callback from the Morpho contract.

onMorphoSupplyCollateral(uint256,bytes).notice: Receives supply collateral callback from the Morpho contract.

unwrapNative(uint256,address).notice: Unwraps wNative tokens to the native token.
